title: Blue Essence Mission and rewards
body:
Hello, Correct me if I'm wrong but the refunding of all runes had a time frame, and anything before that time frame was T3 runes only. So my question is regarding the BE "Mission" I've been hearing about through friends and the league of legends subreddit. I have not recieved this mission, nor the blue essence from my previously bought runes. Now, It's been a fair few years before I bought my runes but lucky me I started with some friends who were already playing so they were all T3 Runes. And after counting them all last night, I came to the conclusion that they should reach 13.5k BE (4.5k from 5 different sets of 3 T3 Quints and 9k from 10 different sets of 9  T3 glyphs, marks and seals.) Upon logging in I was given 5.6k some odd BE making a total of 11.5k with the 6k IP I had been building up. I've been told the mission simply requires a win in any matchmade game and the "BE orbs" will appear in your loot tab. I've checked it a few times to no avail. Any ideas? 

Thanks in advance

replies.body: Hmmmmmm yea this looks a little odd tbh. Hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can gather all the data of what might have gone wrong and they can look into seeing what needs to be done.
